item.title: Mob cap
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Fabric weight and benefits
  • 14 gsm, Polypropylene Spunbond Nonwonve fabric
  • 21" regular size and covers most hair styles.
  • Firmly welded with the elastic and maintains it's original Strength as a single use product.
  • Elastic Opening
  • Secure fit and effective hair drop/lint protection.
  • CE marking approved as PPE (Personal Protective Equipment) , ISO 9001 and 14001
item.content:encoded:
Mob Cap, Double stitch is made of 14 gsm Polypropylene Spunbond Nonwoven fabric to give basic protection to the user.
This is the second generation hair cover products and is mainly used in food and electronic processing factories. It could also be used in hospitals, clinic and healthcare centers where workers are required to use for protection hair drop.

Specifications
Fabric weight and benefits

  • 14 gsm, Polypropylene Spunbond Nonwonve fabric
  • 21″ regular size and covers most hair styles.
  • Firmly welded with the elastic and maintains it’s original Strength as a single use product.
  • Elastic Opening
  • Secure fit and effective hair drop/lint protection.
  • CE marking approved as PPE (Personal Protective Equipment) , ISO 9001 and 14001

Packing
100 pcs per poly bag
10 poly bags per carton (1000pcs)

Available
White, Blue, Green colour as requested Any pattern with up to three colours

item.title: Nurse cap
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Specification 14 gsm, Polypropylene Spunbond Nonwonve fabric 21 or 24 Inch. or customers preference, snap opening and covers most hair styles Firmly done with sewing machine maintain higiene importance Elastic opening Secure fit and effective hair drop/lint protection
item.content:encoded:
Bouffant cap is made of 14 14 gsm polypropylene Spunbond Nonwoven fabric to give excellent protection and professional look to the user.
It’s ideal for medical, and industrial applications, where basic head cover is requirement. Also it can be used in food and electronic processing factories.

Specification
14 gsm, Polypropylene Spunbond Nonwonve fabric
21 or 24 Inch. or customers preference, snap opening and covers most hair styles
Firmly done with sewing machine maintain higiene importance
Elastic opening
Secure fit and effective hair drop/lint protection

Available
White, Blue, Green colour as requested
Any pattern with up to three colours

Packing
100 pcs per poly bag
10 poly bags per carton (1000pcs)

item.title: Surgeon Cap
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Specifications Fabric weight and benefit
  • 40 gsm ( Standard ) or as requested
  • Polypropylene Spunbond nonwoven fabric
  • 64 * 15 cm standard size or as customer request
  • Firmly done with sewing machine
item.content:encoded:
Doctor cap / Surgical cap with back tie is made of 40 gsm Polypropylene Spunbond nonwoven fabric to give basic protection to doctor during operation.
This is light, breathable and comfortable to wear and widely used in hospitial, dental clinic and general clinic.

Specifications
Fabric weight and benefit

  • 40 gsm ( Standard ) or as requested
  • Polypropylene Spunbond nonwoven fabric
  • 64 * 15 cm standard size or as customer request
  • Firmly done with sewing machine

Packing
10 pcs per small bag
20 big bags per carton

Available
Blue and White colour
